languages.text: {n}Хормейстер поднимает иссушенное горем лицо. Капли крови, сочащейся из-под повязки, звонко разбиваются о пол.{/n} "Ваши слова... лекарство для моей души, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хормейстер поднимает иссушенное горем лицо. Капли крови звонко разбиваются о ступени.{/n} "Ваши слова... елей для моей души, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хормейстер поднимает иссушенное горем лицо. Капли крови, сочащейся из-под повязки, звонко разбиваются о пол.{/n} "Ваши слова... лекарство для моей души, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}El maestro del Coro levanta la cabeza, y ves la pesadumbre en su rostro. La sangre que mana en hilillos por debajo de su vendaje repiquetea al gotear sobre la cubierta.{/n} «Sus palabras... son un bálsamo para mi espíritu, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro del Coro levanta la cabeza, y ves la pesadumbre en su rostro. La sangre que mana en hilillos por debajo de su vendaje repiquetea al gotear sobre la cubierta.{/n} «Sus palabras... son un bálsamo para mi espíritu, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターは悲痛に満ち溢れた顔を上げた。包帯の下から滴り落ちる血のしずくが、鳴り響きながら甲板に降り注ぐ。{/n}「陛下、あなたのお言葉は…私の心にとっては薬です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターは悲痛に満ち溢れた顔を上げた。包帯の下から滴り落ちる血のしずくが、鳴り響きながら甲板に降り注ぐ。{/n}「陛下、あなたのお言葉は…私の心にとっては薬です」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师抬起了满是悲伤的脸庞，鲜血渗过双眼上的绷带，滴落在甲板上，发出了清脆的嘀嗒声。{/n}“您的话语……是我灵魂的良药，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师抬起了满是悲伤的脸庞，鲜血渗过双眼上的绷带，滴落在甲板上，发出了清脆的嘀嗒声。{/n}“您的话语……是我灵魂的良药，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Chormeister hebt sein leidgeplagtes Gesicht. Das Blut, das von der Bandage zu Boden tropft, erzeugt auf dem Deck ein eindringliches Geräusch.{/n} "Eure Worte ... sind Balsam für meine Seele, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chormeister hebt sein leidgeplagtes Gesicht. Das Blut, das von der Bandage zu Boden tropft, erzeugt auf dem Deck ein eindringliches Geräusch.{/n} "Eure Worte ... sind Balsam für meine Seele, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Le maître de chœur lève sur vous un visage marqué par le chagrin. Les larmes de sang coulant de sous son bandage viennent s'écraser au sol avec un bruit sourd.{/n} « Vos paroles… me mettent du baume au cœur, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de chœur lève sur vous un visage marqué par le chagrin. Les larmes de sang coulant de sous son bandage viennent s'écraser au sol avec un bruit sourd.{/n} « Vos paroles… me mettent du baume au cœur, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi, kedere bürünmüş yüzünü kaldırıyor. Sargının altından akan kan damlacıkları, çınlayarak güverteye düşüyor.{/n} "Sözleriniz... Ruhuma ilaç gibi geldi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster raises his grief-stricken face. The droplets of blood trickling from under the bandage land on the deck with a ringing sound.{/n} "Your words... are medicine for my soul, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
